entries.journal_entry_description: Imperial Agent Falrey needs information stored in the databanks of the Station Gamma. He needs you to go over there and download the files.  You have a code to break into the databank.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Either use the Gamma Shuttle system, or fly your own space craft.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Travel to Station Gamma Via the Shuttle or Your Ship
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: On the orders of Captain Thrawn, through an agent, you need to go to Station Gamma and retrieve sensitive information from the databanks there.  Go to Station Gamma and find a databank terminal. Use the passcode he gave you to acquire the research data that Agent Falrey needs.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Get Information From Station Gamma Databanks
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Your mission for Agent Falrey is completed. Return to Tansarii space station to talk to him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the information, return to Agent Falrey, in the Cantina on Tansarii Point Station to collect your reward.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Return to Agent Falrey in the Cantina
